name: Step-Up (Onto Bench or Sturdy Surface)
setup: Face a stable box/bench roughly knee height
Hold DBs at sides or perform bodyweight
steps: Place whole foot on box and drive through mid-foot/heel to stand tall
Avoid pushing off the back leg; control the down phase
Alternate legs or complete all reps on one side
mistakes: Only toes on the box (incomplete foot contact)
safety: Use a stable, non-slip surface and set a height that allows control. Lower step height if knee discomfort.

prescriptionHints.notes: Own the top and control the down. Choose a height you can control.

joints.notes: Full foot contact and vertical shin bias can reduce knee stress.
